Segment.name: CV
Segment.comment: To identify the car hire value detail associated with a settlement

Field.name: LoadEmptyStatusCode
Field.comment: Code which specifies the loaded condition of transportation equipment

Field.name: PaymentActionCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the accounts receivable open item(s), if any, to be included in the cash application.

Field.name: CarTypeGroupCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the car type for equalization; Group Code is the first character of the American Association of Railroads (AAR) Car Type Code, DE 301

Field.name: TimePeriodQualifier
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of time period

Field.name: MileageSettlementCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of mileage settlement

Field.name: PenaltyCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of penalty being assessed on foreign equipment

SyntaxNote.name: C0504
SyntaxNote.comment: If CV05 is present, then CV04 is required.
